review: Did not work out of the box... directly connected via ethernet cable...support escalated to development but never heard from support again. Had to install new wireless router, then it worked...signed up for FREE Prime trial and got billed $99.. So $99 for Fire TV $99 for Prime and $60 for new router  and $258 later packed it all up and sent it back...How can this be a good way to Cut-the-Cord?
author: Gary

review: Amazon Fire was delivered timely.  Setup was pretty easy.  The only issue I have right now that I can contribute to the Fire is that every time we watch a new show, the volume is muted.  The only way to get the volume back up is to change the tv's input source from the hdmi (fire) to the television. The HDMI cord was new and delivered from Amazon so I can't determine if the issue is with the device or the cord.  Either way, its a bit annoying.
